snippet: Ericsson, the telecommunications equipment manufacturer, has been sued by a smaller network equipment maker, Airvana Network Solutions, for $330 million. The suit accuses Ericsson of misappropriating trade secrets and producing a "knock-off" product...
abstract: Ericsson, the telecommunications equipment manufacturer, has been sued by a smaller network equipment maker, Airvana Network Solutions, for $330 million. The suit accuses Ericsson of misappropriating trade secrets and producing a "knock-off" product that could put the smaller company out of business.
lead_paragraph: 12:49 p.m., Feb. 9 | Updated Adding response from Ericsson.

headline.main: Network Equipment Maker Airvana Sues Ericsson
